channel.title: Stripes on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in Stripes on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Black-brown belt / 1st Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Tobikomizuki/Nagashizuki/Gyakuzuki Basic 2: Morote barai Basic 3: Otoshi barai & stand up technique Basic 4: Mawashi uraken Solo combinations Solo combination 1 Solo combination 2 Solo combination 3 Solo combination 4 Solo combination 5

item.title: Brown-black belt / 2nd Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Tobi sokuto (Jumping sidekick) Basic 6: Tatsumaki geri (Tornado kick) Solo combinations Solo combination 1: Yoko mawashi geri/Jodan sokuto/Hiza-mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Uraken/Gyakuzuki Solo combination 2: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro mawashi geri/Uraken/Gyakuzuki Solo combination 3: Surikomi mae geri/Nagashizuki/Gyakuzuki/Mawashi geri/Ushiro geri/Uraken

item.title: Brown belt / 3rd Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Gyaku mawashi geri (Hook kick) Basic 6: Ushiro kakato geri (Spinning crescent kick)

item.title: Purple belt / 4th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 6: Ushiro mawashi geri (spinning hook kick) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuku Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki/Haito Solo Combination 3: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Mawashi uraken/Gyakazuki Pairs Pair 1 Attack Defence Pair 2 Attack Defence

item.title: Blue belt / 5th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki Basic 3: Kette junzuki no-tsukommi Basic 4: Kette gyakuzuki no-tsukommi Basic 5: Nagashizuki Basic 6: Kakato geri Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Zenshin Shiite/Joden uke/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuki Pairs Pair 1: Attacker left/Defender right Pair 2: Drop sweep (Otoshi barai)

item.title: Green belt / 6th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kick/Punch (Kette junzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Kette gyakuzuki) Sensei Mary Sensei Rob Basic 3: Tobikomizuki from shizentai Basic 4: Sokuto Chudan Basic 5: Mawashi geri nikai Basic 6: Nidan geri Pairs Pair 1: Overview (Mawashi geri/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Kizamizuki) Pair 1: Defence (Body shield/Chop block) Pair 2: Attack (I forgot to defend my head on the stunning elbow strike) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mawashi geri/Ushiro geri/uraken

item.title: Orange belt / 7th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Junzuki no tsukkomi (leaning front punch) Basic 2: Gyakuzuki no tsukkomi (leaning opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri - Chudan) Basic 4: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 4: Side kick (sokuto) Basic 5: Back kick (Ushiro geri) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Tobikomizuki/Zenshin koutai/Tobikomizuki/Mawashi geri Solo Combination 3: Back fist/chop (uraken/Shuto gamen) Pairs Pair 1 Pair 2

item.title: Yellow-orange belt / 8th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kette junzuki (Front kick and front punch) Basic 2: Kette gyakuzuki (Front kick and opposite punch) Basic 3: Roundhouse kick (Mawashi geri) Basic 4: Step up sidekick (surikomi sokuto) Blocking Blocking Pairs Inner block/Backfist/Gyakuzuki Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Sidekick to the side/Front kick/Opposite punch (Yoko sokuto/Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 2: Roundhouse kick/Opposite punch (Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Side kick/Back fist (Sokuto/Uraken)

item.title: Yellow belt / 9th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick (Mae geri) Basic 4: Step up side kick (surikomi sokuto) Blocking Blocking Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Elbow and back fist (Empi uraken) Solo Combination 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Front kick/Jab punch (Mae geri/Tobikomizuki) Movements Movement 1: Shuffle 1-2/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki Movement 2: Step 1-2 Kata Pinan nidan (1st 9 moves)

item.title: Red-black belt / 10th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step punch (Junzuki) in Zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Elbow strike (Empi) Basic 3: Step up front kick (Surikomi mae geri) Basic 4: Step up roundhouse kick (Surikomi mawashi geri) Blocking Blocking 1: Head block (Jodan uke) Blocking 2: Low block (Gedan barai) Blocking 3: Inner block (Uchi uke) Blocking 4: Cross block high and low (Juju uke jodan and gedan) Movement Movement: Step/Shuffle/Directional changes/Jab and Gyakuzuki

item.title: Red belt / 11th Kyu
item.description: Stances Attention stance/Musubudachi Ready stance/Yo-oi Forward leaning stance (Zenkutsudachi) Horse-riding stance (Kibadachi) Blocking Head block/low block/inner block Movement Step/shuffle/switch/turn

item.title: White belt / 12th Kyu
item.description: Stances Attention stance/Musubudachi Ready stance/Yo-oi Forward leaning stance (Zenkutsudachi) Horse-riding stance (Kibadachi) Punching Punching (blue stripe) Blocking Basic blocking Numbers Numbers 1-10
